entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Invermere
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
